participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys storytelling and humor.
participant_1.background: I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films. I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket. I work in car sales. I like to sit on the couch all day. I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Caring and passionate about music and family.
participant_2.background: I love my mom's home cooked meals. I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow. I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar. I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter. I am twenty five years old.

content.text: Hi there! What are you doing today?
Hey! I'm just about to do some work. How about you?
Not much, just hanging out. I'm a writer and I'm working on a short film.
Oh, that's cool! I love short films. I'm in a band and we're working on a music video.
Nice! What kind of music do you play?
We're a rock band. We play original music.
Cool! Have you played any shows yet?
Yeah, we've played a few shows. We're just starting out, but we're having a lot of fun.
That's great! I'm sure you'll go far.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but some of my favorites are The Strokes, The Killers, and The Arctic Monkeys.
Nice! I like those bands too.
Cool! We're kind of influenced by those bands.
That's cool! I'm excited to see your music video when it's done.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's ready.
